channel.title: roundtable on Enchantment in the History of Capitalism
channel.description: Recent content in roundtable on Enchantment in the History of Capitalism

item.title: Enchantment in theology and scholarship on magic - 24 February 2022
item.description: Speakers Professor Owen Davies, University of Hertfordshire Professor Jason Ānanda Josephson Storm, Williams College Readings Owen Davies, ‘Cunning-Folk in the Medical Market-Place during the Nineteenth Century’. Medical History 43, no. 1 (1999): 55–73. Owen Davies, “Chapter 7: Pulp magic” in Grimoires: A History of Magic Books (Oxford, 2009). Jason Ānanda Josephson Storm, “Max Weber and the Rationalization of Magic,” Yelle and Trein eds., in Narratives of Disenchantment and Secularization (Bloomsbury, 2020), pp.
